name: Tru80s
0:
”Alexa, open true eighties radio”
”Alexa, start true eighties radio”
”Alexa, play true eighties radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: true eighties radio
des: Step into the neon glow of memory lane with Tru80s, where classic synths and electric beats reign supreme. We’re the heartbeat of a decade, pumping out an endless stream of nostalgia with every hit. From the iconic riffs of rock legends to the catchy choruses of pop royalty, we spin the tracks that defined an era. Tune in for the timeless anthems and hidden gems that keep the spirit of the 80s alive and kicking. This is your blast from the past, where the music never stops, and the party never ends. Welcome to the ultimate 80s experience!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
